sent.orig: Listen, at the boat yard you've got a fast cigarette boat, right?
sent.trans: 听着，在码头你有一艘快艇，对不对？

sent.orig: No landing allowed, " leads to his boat-house, where we'll leave the boat. "
sent.trans: 这河汊直逼他的船坞，咱们要在那儿停船上岸。

sent.orig: Casting Town Gate while on a boat no longer leaves you as a land boat.
sent.trans: 在船上施展回城术不会再发生“陆上船”的情况。

sent.orig: People hold dragon boat race on Dragon Boat Festival in memory of Quyuan.
sent.trans: 人们在端午节举行赛龙舟比赛是为了几年屈原。

sent.orig: Start button of armature river boat to build a project, advance main river answer boat project.
sent.trans: 启动右江航电枢纽建设工程，推进主要河流复航工程。
